name: Andrew Baron Painter, Writer, Game designer May 9, 2021
description: Andrew Baron is a New York City based artist who works in the fields of painting, writing, and game design. He studied painting at the Rhode Island School of Design and has exhibited widely in galleries and museums in the United States and abroad. He founded the videogames studio Area 35 and has produced several games. He teaches at the School of Visual Arts and Queens College. https://www.instagram.com/evartology/
